name: Unknown Planet
description:
Unknown Planet is an open world adventure survival game, set on an alien planet with randomly generated worlds.

Explore



After your spacecraft has crash landed, you wake up on a mysterious planet equipped with nothing. You'll need to collect raw materials, build primitive tools, eat, drink, and start on your exploration journey to uncover areas ranging from friendly grass fields to crimson forests, lava wastelands and bio-luminescent biomes full of lifeforms that want to eat you.

Build



Build your base, grow farms to sustain yourself, craft a light for nighttime, smelt metals, replenish your supplies, craft biofuel and batteries to power your buildings, develop the necessary tools and equipment, store your resources and advance through the tech tree by defeating bosses.

Survive



Defend yourself from the fauna by crafting more advanced armor, melee weapons, ranged weapons and ammo. Manage your hunger and thirst by scavenging for food and water, cooking recipes, planting seeds and growing vegetable gardens. Find and explore different biomes to find rarer resources to help you craft more advanced items and survive until you can rebuild your spacecraft and find a way to make it off the planet alive.
